mapper.sql: select u.*,GROUP_CONCAT(role_id) roleIds from ( select u.*, o.org_name, ou.org_id, ur.role_id from sso_user u inner join sso_client_user cu on cu.user_id = u.id left join sso_org_user ou on ou.user_id = u.id left join sso_org o on o.id = ou.org_id left join sso_user_role ur on u.id = ur.user_id union select u.*, o.org_name, ou.org_id, sor.role_id from sso_user u inner join sso_client_user cu on cu.user_id = u.id left join sso_org_user ou on ou.user_id = u.id left join sso_org o on o.id = ou.org_id left join sso_org_role sor on sor.org_id = o.id) u
